educations.degree: Bachelor of Science (BSc) degree in Statistics (Quantitative Finance Stream)
content: Courses: Software Engineering, Distributed Systems, Operating Systems, Advanced Algorithms, Experience Design

educations.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in Management and Finance
content: Courses: Data Structures, OOP, Algorithms, Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Artificial Intelligence

description: Developed and implemented advanced financial systems to collect, analyze, and maintain business intelligence data, leveraging SQL Server and Oracle databases.​
Administered, supported, monitored, tuned, and applied patches to optimize the Power BI reporting environment, ensuring seamless functionality and optimal performance.

Generated comprehensive reports utilizing key performance indicators (KPIs) tailored for Vice-Presidents across diverse sales departments, enhancing data-driven insights and facilitating informed decision-making in the financial systems domain.

Ensured precision in exam administration by maintaining meticulous records, including attendance logs and incident reports, offered support to test-takers with special needs, and facilitated effective communication with testing coordinators and professors for comprehensive exam preparations.​
Developed marketing strategies, organized distribution plans, and procured official collector’s merchandise from Japanese wholesalers with support from over $10,000 in investor funding.​
Organized and maintained basic financial records using Microsoft Office, GSuite, and Paypal for businesses.
Attended North America’s largest fan-run convention as a vendor to over 35,000 participants, leading several other team members.​

blog.title: User Experience Design – A little more than just design
